snippet.title: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Verne: The Shape of Fantasy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424600/Verne_The_Shape_of_Fantasy

Become Jules Verne and adventure into the dangers that hide in Hemera, a fantastic parallel world built from his own imagination. Explore, solve puzzles and unlock the most coveted secret of the mighty Atlantis.

Source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jnF77JW4lY

#trailer #gametrailers #games #gaming
